fields.label: What language is relevant to this data collection?

fields.content: Great! Thank you for deciding to add more information at this stage.

None of the fields are compulsory and some will not be added to a Data Management Plan, but they will help describe and give context to your dataset. You can come back to change or add information at any time during the research project.
If you are using data that is generated by another party;

fields.label: How will you get access to the data?
Is metadata already available for this data? If yes, please provide a link.

fields.content: What keywords or tags would you use to describe the data?
What date or date range will this data cover?

fields.label: Include another way to describe the period, if relevant (eg World War II)

fields.content: What is the geographic location relevant to this dataset? Interactive map might be used later.

Links to datasets related to this collection
